rukus.text: (Muhanmado wa) mayu o hisome,-gao o somuketa
Hitori no mojin ga yatteki (te hanashi ga chudan sa re)ta tamedearu
Anata ni doshite wakarou ka, kare wa kiyome rareru kamo shirenai koto ga
Matawa kunkai o ukeirete, sono oshie hakare o ekisuru kamo shirenai koto ga
Daga nani no tasuke mo iranai mono (zaisan-ka) ni wa
(kanshin o motte) 応待 Suru
Shikamo kare ga mizukara kiyomenakute mo, anata ni sekinin wanai
Daga nesshin ni (shinko o) motomete anata no moto ni kita mono de
ikei no nen o daite iru mono ni wa
anata wa keishi shita
Danjite sodearubekide wanai. Hontoni kore (kuruan) wa kunkaidearu
Dakara dare demo nozomu mono ni wa, kunkai o nenji sase nasai
Soreha (arra no omoto ni aru) chobo ni shirusa rete iru mono
Shiko ni shite seijun'na mono
Shoki-tachi (tenshi) no te de (kiroku sa reta mono)
Kedakaku keiken'na (shoki-tachi)
Ningen (fushinjin-sha) ni wazawai are. Nanto kare wa boon'na koto yo
Kare wa don'na mono kara, kare o tsukura reru no ka
Itteki no seieki karadearu. Kare wa, kare o tsukuri, sorekara gotai o totonoe rare
(haha no tainai kara no) kare no michi o yoi ni nasa re
yagate kare o shina sete hakaba ni ume
sorekara o nozomi no toki ni, kare o yomigaera seru
Iya, kare ga meiji rareta koto o,(fu shinko-sha wa) hatasanakatta
Kare ni, jibun no shokumotsu ni tsuite kangae sasete miruga yoi
Hontoni ware wa, mizu (ame) o yutaka ni sosogi
tsuide daichi o saite kiregire ni shi
soko ni seicho sa seru mono ni wa, kokumotsu
mata budo ya aokusa
oribu ya natsumeyashi
hanmo shita teien
kudamono ya bokuso (ga aru)
Anata gata to anata gata no kachiku no tame no yoekidearu
Yagate,(shumatsu no) hitokoe ga takanari
hito ga jibun no kyodai kara nogareru hi
jibun no haha ya chichi ya
mata jibun no tsuma ya shijo kara (nogareru hi)
Sonohi dare mo kare mo jibun no koto de teippai
(Aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi kagayaki
warai, katsu yorokobu
Daga (aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi 挨 Ni nure
ankoku ga kao o ou
Korera no mono koso, fushinjin'na-sha, hotoshadearu
